SubSections.Title: Move Object
SubSections.Content: Exert mental force to push, pull, or levitate a small object.

SubSections.Title: Crush Object
SubSections.Content: Apply focused mental pressure to break or crush a weak object.

SubSections.Title: Telekinetic Barrier
SubSections.Content: Create a weak telekinetic force field that blocks or slows small incoming objects.

SubSections.Title: Deflect Projectile
SubSections.Content: Alter the trajectory of a fast-moving small projectile using telekinetic force.

SubSections.Title: Telekinetic Grip
SubSections.Content: Hold an object in place or prevent it from being moved.

SubSections.Title: Telekinetic Propulsion
SubSections.Content: Propel yourself or an object forward with force.

SubSections.Title: Read Surface Thoughts
SubSections.Content: Pick up on the immediate conscious thoughts of a willing or weak-minded target.

SubSections.Title: Send Thought
SubSections.Content: Mentally transmit a brief message to a nearby willing recipient.

SubSections.Title: Link Minds
SubSections.Content: Establish a temporary mental connection between multiple individuals to share direct thoughts.

SubSections.Title: Disrupt Focus
SubSections.Content: Cause mental interference to disrupt an individual’s concentration.

SubSections.Title: Sense Awareness
SubSections.Content: Detect nearby sentient creatures based on thought activity.

SubSections.Title: Memory Glimpse
SubSections.Content: Gain brief flashes of strong past memories from a willing target.

SubSections.Title: Project Emotion
SubSections.Content: Instill a basic emotional state, such as fear, anger, or happiness, into a weak-minded target.

SubSections.Title: Mental Shield
SubSections.Content: Resist external mental influences such as charm, fear, or telepathic intrusion.

SubSections.Title: Fortify Will
SubSections.Content: Briefly enhance mental resilience against persuasion, manipulation, or mind control.

SubSections.Title: Suppress Pain
SubSections.Content: Mentally override physical pain signals for a short time.

SubSections.Title: Clear Mind
SubSections.Content: Steady emotions and dispel distractions, maintaining focus in stressful situations.

SubSections.Title: Resist Psychic Probing
SubSections.Content: Create mental static to block attempts at deep thought reading or memory intrusion.

SubSections.Title: See Through Illusions
SubSections.Content: Perceive past falsified visual distortions, magical disguises, or camouflage.

SubSections.Title: Detect Hidden Presence
SubSections.Content: Sense nearby hidden entities, including incorporeal spirits or magically cloaked figures.

SubSections.Title: Pierce Darkness
SubSections.Content: Enhance visual clarity in complete darkness.

SubSections.Title: Focus Senses
SubSections.Content: Momentarily shift your focus on a single sense, greatly enhancing it.

SubSections.Title: See Emotions
SubSections.Content: Detect emotions in speech and actions.

SubSections.Title: Lift Heavy Objects
SubSections.Content: Exert high physical strength to move large or bulky items.

SubSections.Title: Grapple
SubSections.Content: Wrestle and restrain an opponent using raw strength.

SubSections.Title: Break Objects
SubSections.Content: Shatter weak structures, wooden doors, or bindings with brute force.

SubSections.Title: Carry Weight
SubSections.Content: Bear heavy loads for extended periods without fatiguing.

SubSections.Title: Crushing Grip
SubSections.Content: Increase finger strength to apply powerful pressure for gripping and holding.

SubSections.Title: Quick Reflexes
SubSections.Content: Dodge or catch high-speed objects, or react precisely to sudden changes.

SubSections.Title: Balancing Act
SubSections.Content: Maintain footing on narrow surfaces, ledges, or unstable terrain.

SubSections.Title: Precise Hands
SubSections.Content: Perform delicate work, such as lockpicking, surgery, or repair, with minimal error.

SubSections.Title: Acrobatic Evasion
SubSections.Content: Flip, roll, or twist in the air, through tight spaces, or react to awkward landings to minimize impact.

SubSections.Title: Steady Aim
SubSections.Content: Hold weapons, tools, or ranged instruments with minimal shaking, improving accuracy.

SubSections.Title: Sprint
SubSections.Content: Run at high speeds for a short period of time.

SubSections.Title: Pain Tolerance
SubSections.Content: Withstand pain without losing focus or movement capability.

SubSections.Title: Stamina
SubSections.Content: Withstand and reduce exhaustion from running, swimming, climbing, or prolonged exertion.

SubSections.Title: Resist Blows
SubSections.Content: Reduce impact force when struck, making it easier to endure physical attacks.

SubSections.Title: Hold Breath
SubSections.Content: Extend the duration you can go without breathing.

SubSections.Title: Acidic Resistance
SubSections.Content: Withstand long exposure to weak acids.

SubSections.Title: Flame Resistance
SubSections.Content: Withstand flames for long times without being burned.

SubSections.Title: Poison Resistance
SubSections.Content: Reduce or nullify the effects of ingested or injected toxins.

SubSections.Title: Disease Resistance
SubSections.Content: Fight off illnesses faster and reduce symptoms.

SubSections.Title: Pain Resistance
SubSections.Content: Reduce the impact of pain on focus and movement.

SubSections.Title: Heat Resistance
SubSections.Content: Endure high temperatures without overheating or burning easily.

SubSections.Title: Cold Resistance
SubSections.Content: Withstand freezing temperatures without risk of frostbite or slowed movement.

SubSections.Title: Radiation Tolerance
SubSections.Content: Endure low-level radiation exposure with reduced side effects.

SubSections.Title: Eagle Vision
SubSections.Content: See distant objects with greater clarity than normal.

SubSections.Title: Low Light Vision
SubSections.Content: Improve visibility in dim conditions, reducing reliance on external light sources.

SubSections.Title: Identify Fine Details
SubSections.Content: Notice small markings, textures, or subtle visual discrepancies.

SubSections.Title: Spot Fast Movement
SubSections.Content: Track rapid-moving objects or creatures with precision.

SubSections.Title: Peripheral Awareness
SubSections.Content: Detect movement and changes in the environment without direct focus.

SubSections.Title: Read Lips
SubSections.Content: Understand conversations from a distance by reading mouth movements.

SubSections.Title: Amplify Sounds
SubSections.Content: Pick up faint sounds or distant noises more effectively.

SubSections.Title: Filter Sounds
SubSections.Content: Focus on a single sound source while ignoring background noise, such as understanding hushed speech even in noisy environments.

SubSections.Title: Identify Sound Direction
SubSections.Content: Determine the exact location a sound is coming from.

SubSections.Title: Echo Detection
SubSections.Content: Perceive spatial details based on sound reflections in enclosed spaces.

SubSections.Title: Recognize Voice Patterns
SubSections.Content: Identify individuals by their speech or vocal habits.

SubSections.Title: Glide
SubSections.Content: Spread wings to slow a fall and travel distances in the air without rapid descent.

SubSections.Title: High Speed Dive
SubSections.Content: Fly downwards at extreme speeds, and barely miss the ground before recovering.

SubSections.Title: Fast Takeoff
SubSections.Content: Get flying without a reduced start up.

SubSections.Title: Aerial Agility
SubSections.Content: Perform sharp turns, quick stops, and precise aerial movements.

SubSections.Title: Hovering Control
SubSections.Content: Stay in place mid-air with controlled wing adjustments.

SubSections.Title: Wind Resistance
SubSections.Content: Adjust to and move effectively through strong winds without losing balance.

SubSections.Title: Aerial Evasion
SubSections.Content: Dodge incoming projectiles or airborne hazards using rapid wing maneuvers.

SubSections.Title: Floatation Control
SubSections.Content: Maintain buoyancy and stay afloat effortlessly in water.

SubSections.Title: Efficient Stroke
SubSections.Content: Swim with minimal energy use, increasing speed and endurance.

SubSections.Title: Rapid Swimming
SubSections.Content: Increase swimming speed using strong and coordinated strokes.

SubSections.Title: Aqua Maneuvering
SubSections.Content: Change direction quickly and move fluidly through water.

SubSections.Title: Deep Diving
SubSections.Content: Descend to greater depths while managing pressure and breath control.

SubSections.Title: Water Resistance Adaptation
SubSections.Content: Reduce drag and maintain movement efficiency against strong currents.
